showerReviews.reviewText: The Establishment was clean the customer service was friendly got me a mug refill which was normal price $2.45 something like that but went over to Chester's Chicken and got four tenders and two biscuits and came up to almost $16 what a rip-off and they're not even that big don't eat here

Store is clean, nice friendly staff. Went to get food at Chester's and looks like the chicken strips are cut in half. Didn't get a receipt, probably cause the guy was a little busy but spent a little under $12 for 3 super tenders. I've had small tenders before but not cut in half on purpose.
Great clean showers, very specious awesome customer service food freshly made great prices

Cheapest gas in town with thier reward program. Very clean store, and employees are always kind and polite. Today there were several employees out in the lot, washing windows, asking for donations for CMN and handing out samples of thier …
Clean store. They have 20 parking spots for trucks so on the small side.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I’ve ever been to. There’s soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

showerReviews.reviewText: … mornings experience isn't like it usually is. Not sure if they hired new people but definitely sucked.tried to shower and no one has cleaned them apparently. 7 people waiting in line. Tried to get breakfast and asked simple questions …
best and clean truck stop.arrived at night parking available.morning shift 8am oct 21, were very nice to me.clean shower ,water pressure needs update but overall good job. definitely be back
Clean convenient, fuel is a lil cheaper and the shower is clean

… called the pilot , now one 9 , and everything is exactly the same crap . The scheme is simple . They charge $17 per shower . But if you check, you have shower points. So if you want to swim, then they have problems. 2 times per shower is …

We had to wait awhile for a shower but the customer service made up for it. Terry was very nice and accommodating. There are only 4 showers and the women's restroom is just a single room but both were very clean. Parking was pretty easy. Ov …

… not my truck I park at the parking lot. Can I take a shower then she start talking I don’t know why she had a bad day or what’s going on with her, but she was such a racist lady that she is not supposed to work as a customer service …

Better for sure since renovations but still have to fix the hot water takes forever to warm up sometimes and got cold on me for the last time getting winter now makes me not want to shower here again still an issue 6 months later. And wish …
Plenty of parking and no 4wheelers...showers are clean and the staff is friendly....beware shower stall 2's water pressure will put you into the wall harder than Dale Earnhardt..RHPD

… and buy hammer. It ends up that I ran out of hours and had to stay here this evening. Some of the nicest people here and the best shower I've had in a long time. A couple employees that stand out our Dale and Brandon. It was really nice …

Stopped to take shower and I’ve been out here for 27yrs and is the worst shower I ever had!! They actually had a shower curtain and was nasty and by the time I got out the floor was soaked and everything was soaked cause it’s way to small!! …

showerReviews.reviewText: Long wait for shower the lady sit in cashier and another guy walks around and no one go and clean the shower so ppl can get a shower that's so stupid
This is a great stop along US 80, a great place to grab a good meal and pick up fuel, shower and any supplies you may need.
Clean truck stop. Well stocked. Other than taking a cold shower it was good.

Gas price was $0.02 cheaper than the truck stop across the street, but the shower sucked. The handle to turn it on was stuck, the soap dispenser was empty, the dispenser above the sink was just sitting on the counter as it was broken off …

Twice now, I’ve been here to shower. The first time, I was assigned a shower room that already had someone in it. This time I reserved a shower, I was guest number 99 and was assigned shower 6. I had to go get the PIN number from the fuel …
Unprofessional worker.   Don’t care. People waiting  shower around hour.  All showers are empty. Nobody in showers.  Pilot worker don’t care to clean the shower.

I came in at 2:45 in the morning. Reserved a shower. The cashier looked at me and said it's going to be a wait there is only 2 of us and he's about to go on lunch. When I came in one had been outside the other sitting on a stool.  Instead …

Waiting for one hour for a shower, reason is one there to clean used shower ( but there was so many workers just jabbering at cashier no customers) By far this is the worst pilot (even owner pays attention only for the positive reviews …
more when 1 hour for waiting line for a shower , while just 1 costumer in line
excellent truck stop, clean shower and very hot water, they clear snow near the pump.

showerReviews.reviewText: Got diesel and a quick shower. This place is awesome place and the staff is amazing friendly folks

Went and spent 400 on diesel fuel was told that I could use my receipt for my shower all to have the manager not allow me to shower without a loves card... ALL BC MY LOVES ACCOUNT WOULD NOT WORK THE MANAGER OF A NIGHT HISPANIC BAD ATTITUDE …

Showers need major improvements. You can see your breath when you exhale— it’s that cold in the shower room. Also, water pressure is very very poor. Nice parking lot and everything is clean but showers not enjoyable as a trucker.

nyc and clean shower

locations.content: Highway 34 Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Yes, there's shower, and bathrooms are clean.
Plenty parking spots if you consider stay over night.
Only down side is the fuel price, it's not cheap and this location is not in my fuel card's net work.

… deserve a raise for all they do! They are the most friendly group of overnighters I think I've ever encountered, all the while, making sure their store and shower areas are kept nice and clean. Thank you, beautiful ladies, for all that …

Worst place to take a shower ever!!! The lady who took our money for the shower later called the police on us coz my man fell asleep in the parking lot and wouldn't straighten the truck out fast enough! Police said we could get a refund but …

Have come here for the last 6 years. Normally not a bad stop, but this is the third time in a row that I've been told they don't have any showers clean. And each time they say it's going to be after 10:00 after the next shift comes in …
Showers were clean, but no ac in driver's lounge or showers felt like 100 degrees up there. If you want a comfortable stay and shower. Don't stop here

Really inconvenient to stay there for any period of time and hope to shower after work. Only 2 showers and 1 staff on duty so if they get used they aren't cleaned till after next shift starts hours later.
